name: Quinoa Black Bean Salad
description: This quinoa black bean salad makes the perfect lunch and it's also a great for BBQs and potlucks! It's so easy, entirely vegan, and super healthy!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook your quinoa. I usually make mine in the Instant Pot and it turns out perfect and fluffy every time. I cook it with one cup of water for 1 minute on high pressure and let the pressure release naturally for 12 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse and drain the black beans and the corn. Cut the cherry tomatoes into halves and the bell pepper into medium-sized pieces. Finely chop the cilantro. Chop the red onion. Cut the green onion into rings.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a small bowl and stir until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, the vegetables and beans, and the dressing. Store the salad in the fridge until you serve it.
